title: Support Feedback Submitted
description: Fires when a user submits feedback such as a CSAT survey, NPS rating, or general feedback.

feedbackId.description: Unique identifier for the feedback submission.

score.description: Numeric score given by the user.

maxScore.description: Maximum possible score for the feedback scale.

hasComment.description: Whether the user included a written comment with the feedback.

channel.description: Channel through which the feedback was submitted.
